article: I live _ a town. It's not big but very clean. I like the town very much. My home is on the third floor. There is a _ next to my home. I often buy vegetables and other things here. The post office is next _ the supermarket. It's _ the right of the supermarket. A big restaurant is across _ them. The _ there is very nice. Many people eat there every day. There is a hotel behind the restaurant. The hotel is old but very busy _ it's the only one in the town. There is a bank and a library in my town. The library is in front _ the bank. _ are a lot of interesting books in the library. My town is a good place.
